% Tracking Point Entity Table
% Auto-generated from JSON schema

\begin{entitytable}{Tracking Point}
\textbf{\field{equipmentUsed}} & string & Equipment deployed at this tracking point \\
\textbf{\field{establishedTimestamp}} & string (date-time) & Establishedtimestamp field value \\
\textbf{\field{geographicDataId}} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to GeographicData entity \\
\textbf{\field{pointType}} & enum(7 values) & Type of tracking point - flexible configuration based on operational needs \\
\textbf{\field{trackingPointId}} & string (pattern) & Unique identifier for the tracking point \\
\field{configurationRole} & enum(4 values) & Role of this point in the overall tracking configuration \\
\field{coordinatePrecision} & number (≥1, ≤100) & Required coordinate precision in meters (e.g., 5 = ±5m accuracy) \\
\field{operatorId} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to Operator entity \\
\end{entitytable}
